title: Austrian Man Found Guilty in Girlfriend’s Death on Mountain Hike
summary_full: Thomas Plamberger was given a suspended prison sentence and fined in a case that tested the limits of personal responsibility in mountaineering.
summary_public: Thomas Plamberger was given a suspended prison sentence and fined in a case that tested the limits of personal responsibility in mountaineering.
